languages.text: {n}Сведя кудлатые брови, мужчина решительно тычет в вашу сторону стволом своего огнестрельного недоразумения.{/n} "А ну не пужай! Щас как кликну по воксу стражу, они тебя живо за пехотки возьмут! У стражи с бандитами разговор коро..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Сведя кудлатые брови, мужчина решительно тычет в вашу сторону стволом своего огнестрельного недоразумения.{/n} "А ну не пужай! Щас как кликну по воксу стражу, они тебя живо за пехотки возьмут! У стражи с бандитами разговор коро..."

languages.text: {n}The old man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna scare the pants off me, are you? Well, I'll have none of that! Or I'll call them wardens over the vox, they'll grab ya by the floppers right quick! Them wardens, they don't mollycoddle bandits like yo—"
languages.original_text: {n}Сведя кудлатые брови, мужчина решительно тычет в вашу сторону стволом своего огнестрельного недоразумения.{/n} "А ну не пужай! Щас как кликну по воксу стражу, они тебя живо за пехотки возьмут! У стражи с бандитами разговор коро..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna scare the pants off me, are you? Well, I'll have none of that! Or I'll call them wardens over the vox, they'll grab ya by the floppers right quick! Them wardens, they don't mollycoddle bandits, believe you me..."

Or I'll call them wardens over the vox, they'll grab ya by the floppers right quick! Them wardens, they don't mollycoddle bandits like yo—"

languages.text: {n}老人皱了皱毛茸茸的眉毛，用他那把破枪朝你的方向戳了戳。{/n}“你是不是打算吓唬我？别以为你能得逞！我准备用音阵装置把那些守卫叫过来，他们马上就会把你抓住！那些守卫可不像你这种土匪……”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna scare the pants off me, are you? Well, I'll have none of that! Or I'll call them wardens over the vox, they'll grab ya by the floppers right quick! Them wardens, they don't mollycoddle bandits like yo—"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人皱了皱毛茸茸的眉毛，用他那把破枪朝你的方向戳了戳。{/n}“你是不是打算吓唬我？别以为你能得逞！我准备用音阵装置把那些守卫叫过来，他们马上就会把你抓住！那些守卫可不想你这种土匪……”

languages.text: {n}男はボサボサの眉をひそめ、銃をあなたに向かって突きつけた。{/n}「驚かそうってのかぁ？あぁ？相手を間違えたね！無線でワーデンを呼んでやろうか？てめぇの事をすぐさま引っ掴むぞ！あいつらは、てめぇみたいな盗賊を甘やかさねぇからな…」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna scare the pants off me, are you? Well, I'll have none of that! Or I'll call them wardens over the vox, they'll grab ya by the floppers right quick! Them wardens, they don't mollycoddle bandits like yo—"

traits.locale_text: {n}男はボサボサの眉をひそめ、銃をあなたに向かって突きつけた。{/n}「驚かそうってのかぁ？あぁ？相手を間違えたね！無線でワーデンを呼んでやろうか？てめぇの事をすぐさま引っ掴むぞ！あいつらは、てめぇみたいな盗賊を甘やかさねぇからな…」

languages.text: {n}El anciano frunce su poblado ceño y agita su mal llamada arma hacia ti.{/n} «¿Intentas asustarme? ¡Pues ni hablar! Voy a llamar a los guardias por voco, ¡ya te cogerán por las orejas! Porque los guardias no se andan con chiquitas con los bandidos co...».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna scare the pants off me, are you? Well, I'll have none of that! Or I'll call them wardens over the vox, they'll grab ya by the floppers right quick! Them wardens, they don't mollycoddle bandits like yo—"

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano frunce su poblado ceño y agita su mal llamada arma hacia ti.{/n} «¿Intentas asustarme? ¡Pues ni hablar! Voy a llamar a los guardias por voco, ¡ya te cogerán por las orejas! Porque los guardias no se andan con chiquitas con los bandidos co...».

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann runzelt die Stirn und richtet seine Farce von Schusswaffe in deine Richtung.{/n} "Ihr wollt mir wohl Angst machen, was? Tja, das könnt Ihr vergessen! Sonst rufe ich über Vox die Wächter, und die packen Euch ganz schnell beim Gebaumel! Die Wächter fassen Banditen wie Euch nicht mit Samthandschuh-"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna scare the pants off me, are you? Well, I'll have none of that! Or I'll call them wardens over the vox, they'll grab ya by the floppers right quick! Them wardens, they don't mollycoddle bandits like yo—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann runzelt die Stirn und richtet seine Farce von Schusswaffe in deine Richtung.{/n} "Ihr wollt mir wohl Angst machen, was? Tja, das könnt Ihr vergessen! Sonst rufe ich über Vox die Wächter, und die packen Euch ganz schnell beim Gebaumel! Die Wächter fassen Banditen wie Euch nicht mit Samthandschuhen an ..."

languages.text: {n}L'homme hausse ses sourcils broussailleux et braque son arme de fortune sur vous.{/n} « Vous essayez de me flanquer la frousse, hein ? Ça prend pas avec moi ! Vous allez voir, je vais appeler les gardiens pour qu'ils viennent vous prendre par la peau des fesses ! Parce que croyez-moi, les gardiens, ils plaisantent pas avec les bandits comme v... »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna scare the pants off me, are you? Well, I'll have none of that! Or I'll call them wardens over the vox, they'll grab ya by the floppers right quick! Them wardens, they don't mollycoddle bandits like yo—"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme hausse ses sourcils broussailleux et braque son arme de fortune sur vous.{/n} « Vous essayez de me flanquer la frousse, hein ? Ça prend pas avec moi ! Vous allez voir, je vais appeler les gardiens pour qu'ils viennent vous prendre par la peau des fesses ! Parce que croyez-moi, les gardiens, ils plaisantent pas avec les bandits comme v... »

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar, gür kaşlarını çatıp elindeki silah demeye bin şahit isteyen mekanizmayı sana doğrultuyor.{/n} "Aklın sıra beni korkutacağan, he mi? Yemezler! Şimdi vokstan muhafızları çağırıp tutuklatayım sizi de görün gününüzü! Muhafızların hiç şakası yoktur, adamı çok fe..."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna scare the pants off me, are you? Well, I'll have none of that! Or I'll call them wardens over the vox, they'll grab ya by the floppers right quick! Them wardens, they don't mollycoddle bandits like yo—"

traits.locale_text: {n}İhtiyar, gür kaşlarını çatıp elindeki silah demeye bin şahit isteyen mekanizmayı sana doğrultuyor..{/n} "Aklın sıra beni korkutacağan, he mi? Yemezler! Şimdi voks'tan muhafızları çağırıp tutuklatayım sizi de görün gününüzü! Muhafızların hiç şakası yoktur, adamı çok fe..."
